name: Light Speed Delivery
description:
Pizza-Man requires your management skills!
The residents of several streets are angrily holding out for pizzas..!
Send your delivery people, armed with motorcycles, to feed the residents!


Direct your delivery people through hysterical traffic.
Don't forget to irritate the locals by hijacking traffic lights for your own benefits!

Controls:
Mouse - Drag the mouse from a delivery person to one or more junction tiles to move them around.
Keyboard's alphabet keys - Enter the displayed code to hijack a junction tile.
ESC - Pause/Unpause.

Pizza-Man believes in you. Good luck.
